page.title: 15THE PARISH REVEREND
page.content: REV.Clark has been a minister for 12 years and has been in this area for 3 years. He is in charge of 6 parishes, including Weasenham St.Peter, Weasenham All Saints, Raynham and Wellingham. Services St. Peter 2 per week All Saints 1 per month Wellingham 3 per year He has performed many Christenings and funerals but there has only been one wedding since he has been here. Besides the services, he visits the school and the people of the villages and he thinks his most important task is to lead the parishioners in the worship of God. At school we enjoy his visits because he makes the stories lively and interesting and often funny. Rev. Clark's favourite T.V programme is"One Man and His Dog".
